item.title: MSI B85M-E45, i5 4570T, Noctua HSF, Ram, PSU
item.author: invalid@example.com (KaiShin)
item.dc:creator: KaiShin
item.content:encoded:
I've decommissioned my low power Windows based Plex server and upgraded to an unRAID server based on server hardware to allow me to run some VM's also, as such the following is for sale.

Postage = Pickup, all posts are PP. Will close all sales 24 hours after res is met.

Item 1 -

MSI B85M-E45 motherboard, approx 12 months old, comes with box, IO shield however no SATA cables, I pinched them for the new build.

Res $40

Item 2 -

Intel i5 4570T low power CPU

Res $80

Item...

MSI B85M-E45, i5 4570T, Noctua HSF, Ram, PSU

item.title: MetaBox Prime P670HP (17.3" 1080P, I7-7700HQ, GTX 1060 6GB, 16GB DDR4-2400, 480GB M2 PCIE SSD)
item.author: invalid@example.com (Domokun)
item.dc:creator: Domokun
item.content:encoded:
Purchased through Kong Computers and is less than 8 months old, with 16 months of warranty remaining. In absolutely fantastic condition cosmetically and functionally. It has sat stationary on my office desk since purchasing, and hasn't been transported or traveled with. Comes in the original packaging.

The full specifications are as follows:
  • Model: MetaBox Prime P670HP
  • Operating System: Windows 10 Pro (Digital License, Bound to Laptop)*
  • Display: 17.3"...

MetaBox Prime P670HP (17.3" 1080P, I7-7700HQ, GTX 1060 6GB, 16GB DDR4-2400, 480GB M2 PCIE SSD)

item.title: E6400 / Radeon HD 6870 / 6GB RAM / 2x SSD workstation
item.author: invalid@example.com (saboteurEK)
item.dc:creator: saboteurEK
item.content:encoded:
Hi,

I have my M50 workstation for sale. I'm moving to a smaller house and have to downsize, the machine itself works fine. Pickup from Western Suburbs Brisbane.

I've used the graphics card with a triple monitor setup in the past for rFactor.

Includes keyboard and mouse but no monitor.

Specs:
  • Intel Core 2 Duo E6400
  • Intel 975X chipset
  • 6GB ECC RAM
  • AMD Radeon HD 6870 with 1GB RAM
  • Corsair VS450 power supply

Three drives:
  • 60GB Intel 330 series SSD...

E6400 / Radeon HD 6870 / 6GB RAM / 2x SSD workstation

Pick up is in VIC 3011 on weekends or after 6PM on weeknights.

Preference is for the whole system to go - I will throw in 1 x 128GB OCZ SSD & 3TB Hard drive if purchased whole. (Gaming chair does not have to part of the package if someone doesn't want it but it has to go!).

Willing to part with the whole system for...

Gaming PC - 6700K, 980Ti x2, G Skill Trident DDR4 etc

item.title: Astro A40TR / MixAmp Pro TR - Black
item.author: invalid@example.com (juzz86)
item.dc:creator: juzz86
item.content:encoded:
Got these for Chrissie, but prefer the wireless Logitech setup I had going so looking at reverting back.

Good cans, made even better with the MixAmp. Best-suited for games (experience in ARK / Subnautica / Farming Simulator / FTL very good) but music sounds great on PC too. 'Tournament' EQ setting was my favourite, with Dolby off for best gravel-crunching / bubble-blowing.

Will happily admit I wasn't a huge fan of the music experience without the MixAmp - [Xiaomi] Phone's shitty 'smart'...

Astro A40TR / MixAmp Pro TR - Black
